sig_info: When Telepath Form is active and Emma would lose more than 50 to 15% of her Max Health from a single source, she activates Diamond Form for 3 seconds to reduce the damage. This ability activates before checking Armor and Resistances.
When Emma uses a Special Attack, the Opponent’s controls are reversed until just after the end of the attack. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.

PASSIVE: Emma starts the fight in Diamond Form.
When Emma is at least one Power Level ahead of the Opponent, she deactivates Diamond Form and switches to Telepath Form.
When the Opponent is at least one Power Level ahead of Emma, she deactivates Telepath Form and switches to Diamond Form.
If the opponent uses an Armor Break while Emma is in Diamond Form, she is forced into Telepath Form, and cannot swap back for the duration of the Armor Break.
PASSIVE - DIAMOND FORM: Emma’s organic diamond is immune to all Stun, Bleed, Poison, Incinerate, Shock, Frostbite, Coldsnap, Fatigue, Concussion, and Exhaustion effects.
Well-timed Blocks grant a Prowess Passive.

When Emma changes into Diamond form, she replaces all temporary Prowess Passives with new indefinite Prowess Passives that increase Special Attack Damage by +10%. Prowess Passives are capped at 5 in Diamond Form.
10% chance that a Block is a Perfect Block, reducing all damage to 0.
PASSIVE - TELEPATH FORM: When Emma changes into Telepath form, she replaces all indefinite Prowess Passives with new Prowess Passive that increase Special Attack Damage by +10% and last 7 seconds. Prowess Passives are capped at 10 in Telepath form.
Critical hits grant a Prowess Passive, and refresh all existing Prowess Passives.
Emma is able to read her Opponent’s thoughts, allowing all of Emma’s attacks to ignore Evade.
+177.78 Critical Rate for each active Prowess effect.
+32.65 Critical Damage Rating for each active Prowess effect.
HEAVY ATTACK - DIAMOND FORM: Generate 50% additional Power.
Opponents generate 80% less power from this attack.
HEAVY ATTACK - TELEPATH FORM: 60% chance to inflict a Taunt Debuff on the Opponent for 5 seconds.
These Debuffs are removed if Emma switches to Diamond Form.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Emma switches to Telepath form for the duration of the attack.
Once Emma finishes a Special Attack, all Prowess Passives are removed.
These attacks are Psychic and deal True Damage, ignoring all of the Opponent's Armor.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Power Sting for 8 second(s). An Opponent with Power Sting takes 78.3 Direct Damage when activating a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Concussion for 8 second(s), reducing the Opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to reduce the Opponent’s Power Gain from all sources by 75% for 8 seconds.

sig_info: When Telepath Form is active and Emma would lose more than 50 to 15% of her Max Health from a single source, she activates Diamond Form for 3 seconds to reduce the damage. This ability activates before checking Armor and Resistances.
When Emma uses a Special Attack, the Opponent’s controls are reversed until just after the end of the attack. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.

When Emma changes into Diamond form, she replaces all temporary Prowess Passives with new indefinite Prowess Passives that increase Special Attack Damage by +10%. Prowess Passives are capped at 5 in Diamond Form.
10% chance that a Block is a Perfect Block, reducing all damage to 0.
PASSIVE - TELEPATH FORM: When Emma changes into Telepath form, she replaces all indefinite Prowess Passives with new Prowess Passive that increase Special Attack Damage by +10% and last 7 seconds. Prowess Passives are capped at 10 in Telepath form.
Critical hits grant a Prowess Passive, and refresh all existing Prowess Passives.
Emma is able to read her Opponent’s thoughts, allowing all of Emma’s attacks to ignore Evade.

When Emma uses a Special Attack, the Opponent’s controls are reversed until just after the end of the attack. This will not trigger when fighting an Opponent with #Psychic Shielding.

PASSIVE: Emma starts the fight in Diamond Form.
When Emma is at least one Power Level ahead of the Opponent, she deactivates Diamond Form and switches to Telepath Form.
When the Opponent is at least one Power Level ahead of Emma, she deactivates Telepath Form and switches to Diamond Form.
If the opponent uses an Armor Break while Emma is in Diamond Form, she is forced into Telepath Form, and cannot swap back for the duration of the Armor Break.
PASSIVE - DIAMOND FORM: Emma’s organic diamond is immune to all Stun, Bleed, Poison, Incinerate, Shock, Frostbite, Coldsnap, Fatigue, Concussion, and Exhaustion effects.
Well-timed Blocks grant a Prowess Passive.

When Emma changes into Diamond form, she replaces all temporary Prowess Passives with new indefinite Prowess Passives that increase Special Attack Damage by +10%. Prowess Passives are capped at 5 in Diamond Form.
10% chance that a Block is a Perfect Block, reducing all damage to 0.
PASSIVE - TELEPATH FORM: When Emma changes into Telepath form, she replaces all indefinite Prowess Passives with new Prowess Passive that increase Special Attack Damage by +10% and last 7 seconds. Prowess Passives are capped at 10 in Telepath form.
Critical hits grant a Prowess Passive, and refresh all existing Prowess Passives.
Emma is able to read her Opponent’s thoughts, allowing all of Emma’s attacks to ignore Evade.
+222.22 Critical Rate for each active Prowess effect.
+40.82 Critical Damage Rating for each active Prowess effect.
HEAVY ATTACK - DIAMOND FORM: Generate 50% additional Power.
Opponents generate 80% less power from this attack.
HEAVY ATTACK - TELEPATH FORM: 60% chance to inflict a Taunt Debuff on the Opponent for 5 seconds.
These Debuffs are removed if Emma switches to Diamond Form.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Emma switches to Telepath form for the duration of the attack.
Once Emma finishes a Special Attack, all Prowess Passives are removed.
These attacks are Psychic and deal True Damage, ignoring all of the Opponent's Armor.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Power Sting for 8 second(s). An Opponent with Power Sting takes 1094.4 Direct Damage when activating a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Concussion for 8 second(s), reducing the Opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to reduce the Opponent’s Power Gain from all sources by 75% for 8 seconds.

PASSIVE - DIAMOND FORM: Emma’s organic diamond is immune to all Stun, Bleed, Poison, Incinerate, Shock, Frostbite, Coldsnap, Fatigue, Concussion, and Exhaustion effects.
Well-timed Blocks grant a Prowess Passive.

When Emma changes into Diamond form, she replaces all temporary Prowess Passives with new indefinite Prowess Passives that increase Special Attack Damage by +10%. Prowess Passives are capped at 5 in Diamond Form.
10% chance that a Block is a Perfect Block, reducing all damage to 0.
PASSIVE - TELEPATH FORM: When Emma changes into Telepath form, she replaces all indefinite Prowess Passives with new Prowess Passive that increase Special Attack Damage by +10% and last 7 seconds. Prowess Passives are capped at 10 in Telepath form.
Critical hits grant a Prowess Passive, and refresh all existing Prowess Passives.
Emma is able to read her Opponent’s thoughts, allowing all of Emma’s attacks to ignore Evade.
+177.78 Critical Rate for each active Prowess effect.
+32.65 Critical Damage Rating for each active Prowess effect.
HEAVY ATTACK - DIAMOND FORM: Generate 50% additional Power.
Opponents generate 80% less power from this attack.
HEAVY ATTACK - TELEPATH FORM: 60% chance to inflict a Taunt Debuff on the Opponent for 5 seconds.
These Debuffs are removed if Emma switches to Diamond Form.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Emma switches to Telepath form for the duration of the attack.
Once Emma finishes a Special Attack, all Prowess Passives are removed.
These attacks are Psychic and deal True Damage, ignoring all of the Opponent's Armor.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to inflict Power Sting for 8 second(s). An Opponent with Power Sting takes 85.5 Direct Damage when activating a Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict Concussion for 8 second(s), reducing the Opponent’s Ability Accuracy by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to reduce the Opponent’s Power Gain from all sources by 75% for 8 seconds.
